content: मीलित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [मील्-क्त] {@--1@} Shut, closed. {@--2@} Twinkled. {@--3@} Half-opened, unblown. {@--4@} Vanished, disappeared. {@--5@} Assembled, gathered (for मिलित). --तं (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) A figure of speech in which the difference or distinction between two objects is shown to be completely obscured on account of their similarity, whether natural or artificial, in some respects; it is thus defined by Mammaṭa: --समेन लक्ष्मणा वस्तु वस्तुना यन्निगृह्यते . निजेनागंतुना वापि तन्मीलितमिति स्मृतं .. <ls>K. P. 10.</ls>
